about_the_game:
1962. Otherworldly creatures have appeared along the Trans-Canada Highway and the army's strongest weapon, a gigantic robot bear, has been possessed by the source of this evil!

The Canadian government hires a crack team of specialists to drive into the monster-infested territory and stop the enormous possessed robot before it reaches more populated areas. To do so, these brave souls must fight back the monsters swarming the highway while maintaining their vehicle and looking for better car parts! Will they survive, or die trying?

Ride in a beat-up gun-mounted SUV with your friends! Maintain damaged parts and choose a role:

  • The driver handles the car and must make it to the end of the level, no matter what.

  • The spotter can see important locations and ping enemies for the gunner to shoot at. Become the eyes and ears of your team!

  • The gunner operates the car's machine gun and must protect their group from the hordes of monsters swarming the highway! Shoot, shoot, SHOOT!

  • The mechanic needs to allocate power throughout the car to make quick repairs while on the road! If the car dies, you all die.

Get in and out of the car at any time to stop and explore locations along the way. You and your friends are vulnerable while on foot, so be careful! The abominations that roam the woods hunger for your flesh...

Scavenge for car parts and upgrades to stay alive and defeat the final boss. Modify your car with spare parts you find along the way to upgrade its performance and capabilities!

Roleplay with your friends thanks to proximity voice chat and goofy character emotes! Choose between 4 different playable characters and equip accessories to personalize them!

content_descriptors.notes: The game features a grim setting. Players can use a machine gun to kill various monsters and be killed in different ways.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Get in a 60's gun-mounted SUV with your friends and fight hordes of hellish creatures in this first-person co-op survival title! Drive down the roads of the Great White North, scavenge for car parts, and try to survive!
